channel.title: OT-Cleaner on optstats
channel.description: Recent content in OT-Cleaner on optstats

item.title: OT CLEANER: LABEL CORRECTION AS OPTIMAL TRANSPORT
item.description: Abstract Noisy label affects the model generalization; Label correction as a method to handel it but fail to handel, heavy noise samples with many categories What is global label distribution? The work formulates the label correction to an optimal transport problem; Having the superiority on training efficiency and classification accuracy;
